item.title: (Temporarly) Living in a IPv6 only world
item.description: On the evening of 2nd December, I have noticed something funny - only half of the internet was working. The other half? Disappeared off the planet.

item.title: Future of Netsocs
item.description: Networking Societies. If you have been studying computer science in an university, you might have been or heard of one. But are they still relevant in today’s world of instant communication and common internet access?

item.title: My story with DigitalOcean
item.description: Let’s go to the beginning of time. Back in 2013 I was developing an Android app French Made Easy back in secondary school. The app data was written in Wordpress and then extracted using a PHP script into JSON format.
